title: Battle Of The Sexes Board Game
description:  Battle of the Sexes is the outrageous and hormonally charged game that pits men vs. women in the ultimate showdown. You’ll never understand them, so you might as well defeat them. Teams earn trophies by successfully answering gender-defining questions and completing challenges. Packed with pictures, trivia, challenges, and more, it’s an outrageously fun way to finally answer the question: Which sex is superior, Male or Female?4 or more players in teamsEndless fun where men are pitted against womenEasy, out of the box game playGreat adult party gameIncluded are 5 tug of war movers, 56 challenge tokens, 220 question cards, 1 game board, 1 instruction sheet
